attributes.action: Look into the PIP assessors they are too judgemental.
attributes.additional_details: Reassess the PIP system so that the assessors understand what they are being told rather than making a judgement themselves.  Train them so they understand what the various disabilities are and understand them.
attributes.background: The people that do the assessments for PIP are Judgemental.  It is hard enough to get for children with disabilities, without having to go through that as well.  Have a look at the information they gather and how it is judged.
